Articles.Content:
I've actually been playing this game for a small while now and stalked these forums for tips and such. I felt perhaps i should begin to contribute back to the community instead, or at least to announce my existence!

My accomplishments however compared to some other peoples i have seen here however are incredibly modest but i'm looking forward to exploring more of this game and been pretty hooked these last few months xD. Always seems to be 'just one more lander before bed time' but sadly just one more lander can take a fair while it seems .

Welcome to the community Groundog,

dont worry about your achievements, some people like me spend way to much time on the game,

Happy launching

B787

I've actually been playing this game for a small while now and stalked these forums for tips and such.

Wait, is that why there are like 700 guests always online?

And also, my mind keeps reading your username as groundhog. Does this apply to anyone else?
I'm distinctly Groundog, not Groundhog I feel I should clarify xD and more than likely, this place is more useful than the wiki in points
